groups.title: Article 16: Provider Duties for High-Risk AI Systems
groups.description: Core obligations for providers of high-risk AI systems under Article 16

groups.title: Articles 9–15: System Requirements for High-Risk AI Systems
groups.description: Core system-level requirements in Section 2 (risk management, data, documentation, logging, transparency, human oversight, accuracy/robustness/cybersecurity)

groups.title: Article 26: Deployer Duties for High-Risk AI Systems
groups.description: Core obligations for deployers of high-risk AI systems (use per IFU, oversight, input data, monitoring/suspension/notification, logs, workplace info, public registration, DPIA info, PRBI constraints, natural person info, cooperation)

groups.title: Article 27: FRIA Obligations for Deployers
groups.description: Fundamental rights impact assessment (FRIA) requirements prior to deployment, notification and complementarity with DPIA
